source.query: select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from taxon;

SELECT
    st.id,
    st.parent_id AS parent_id,
    st.position,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) as name,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink,
    st.taxonomy_id,
    st.created_at,
    st.updated_at,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords,
    st.visible,
    Date(st.start_time) AS start_date,
    Cast( Substring(To_char(st.start_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)  AS text) AS start_time,
    Date(st.end_time) AS end_date,
    Cast(Substring(To_char(st.end_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS text) AS end_time,
    st.product_text_tag_en,
    st.product_text_tag_ar,
    COALESCE(st.tag_to_show, '') AS tag_to_show,
    st.visible_only_for_subscriber,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) as name_ar,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords_ar,
    '' as pretty_name,
    '' as pretty_name_ar,
    'false' as featured
FROM
    spree_taxons st
LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt on stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
where st.updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}'
GROUP BY
    st.id;
